data.name: Confessions at Candlewood Lake Artbook
data.detailed_description: Re-live the snap holiday romance of "Confessions at Candlewood Lake". The Official Art Book displays the art featured in this comical romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.about_the_game: Re-live the snap holiday romance of "Confessions at Candlewood Lake". The Official Art Book displays the art featured in this comical romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.short_description: Re-live the snap holiday romance of "Confessions at Candlewood Lake". The Official Art Book displays the art featured in this comical romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and above
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
